name: Zamberlan Hydrobloc Proofing Cream
description: Formulated specifically for use on Zamberlan® Hydrobloc™ full grain leathers (smooth and waxy finish) to enhance their water resistance and appearance. Also suitable for other synthetically tanned full grain leathers. Not for use on Nubuck, split, or roughout leathers as it will darken and change the finish of the leather.Refined mixture of non-oil based petroleum hydrocarbons, waxes and paraffins melted in mineral turpentine.Protects leather without softening.
